title: JackieKing
author: JackieKing
content: I need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: You should have a skill so that you'll be given tasks. Start with what you know, don't say that you don't have a skill, you should have at least 1 of it.Anyway, check the popular freelancing website for you to see if there are offers what you think fits you.UpworkFiverrFreelancer.com

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI have no skill but I am interested to learn job.You look a bit confused here. You want to do a job but you have no skill and you want to learn Job skill.It will be very hard to find an online job where you can earn almost 5 to 10$ without any skill. With skill and experience, you can for sure earn this amount through freelancing but no one will hire you without skill in an online job.How about finding some odds jobs in your local area and with the amount you earn, try to invest some in learning skills. Keep in mind that earning money requires hard work whether it is online earning or offline earning.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.People are going to pay you for your skill, so if you don't have skills why would people hire you, and what could you possibly do to get a job here, the easiest is to be a writer if you're English is good and it is your native language or at least your secondary language, you go try publish0x.com the site pays you to rate and write articles but I don't think you can earn $5 here you need to write 5 to 10 articles at least daily to try to make $5 or up.

comments.author: JackieKing
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on July 29, 2023, 09:26:30 AMQuote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.People are going to pay you for your skill, so if you don't have skills why would people hire you, and what could you possibly do to get a job here, the easiest is to be a writer if you're English is good and it is your native language or at least your secondary language, you go try publish0x.com the site pays you to rate and write articles but I don't think you can earn $5 here you need to write 5 to 10 articles at least daily to try to make $5 or up.Thanks for information bro.

comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on July 29, 2023, 07:29:21 AMYou should have a skill so that you'll be given tasks. Start with what you know, don't say that you don't have a skill, you should have at least 1 of it.Anyway, check the popular freelancing website for you to see if there are offers what you think fits you.UpworkFiverrFreelancer.comOP said they don't have skills and these websites require skills.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.You are not going to get a decent job online or even offline if you're undermining yourself, you are a bounty hunter since last year and you have participated in social media campaigns so at least you have social media skills, since you are already in this forum for several months why don't just upgrade and be good poster you can get in a decent job that pays a minimum of $20 in a signature campaign, if you contribute here in Bitcointalk, the only lazy job we have online that requires no skill are faucets I'm sure you don't want to waste your time clicking ads that will take you months to cash out.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI have no skill but I am interested to learn job.Are you being serious here? Learn skills first before you find job? Don't be a jack of all trade expert of none because you can't find a decent that will works in your favor since you can't adjust quickly on any job that will throw at especially on freelance online job that requires efficiency on time since you are being paid in hourly basis so your employer expects productivity and not consuming some of your work time studying the job.Upwork is my previous freelance website I use during pandemic when I newly resign to my work before I start my business but I doubt that you can get any work offer there with this kind of working condition of yours.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What are the things you like to do, if you have a computer with good specifications, you can start learning Photoshop and design, if you are inclined to language, you can translate articles and projects or learn a programming language and start developing applications, and if you are an artist, you can sell your paintings in NFT form.Tell us what you like to do and we can give you better options.$600 is the maximum you can earn here from just creating posts (but you need to develop your knowledge of Bitcoin)Overall, I gave you a merit, I hope it will motivate you to develop yourself.

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: Your expectations may not be too high for this forum. One of the ways to make money here is by joining a signature campaign, which doesn't require specific skills; you just have to be active and participate. However, it does require merits, and your account needs to be active. I suggest trying to be more active and helpful to earn merits.While there are other ways to earn money outside the forum, as others have suggested, unfortunately, you don't have a skill yet, and learning might take some time before you can find a suitable job. Additionally, competition should be considered, as the online world is continually expanding.Therefore, be sure to evaluate things properly so you won't end up wasting time. Be resourceful and look for suggestions that you love and can practically do.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: OP, I know we live in a modern world that is always evolving, but you still need to have a real job out there, and to do that, you need to learn a skill that can enable you to get the job. If there is no money to learn a skill, then you can just get yourself any small job that doesn't really require a trained profession, work there, and save up some money, after which you can learn a skill. But if you have a laptop, like @hugeblack has said, there are some online courses you can take that will help you get some jobs online. Through some online courses, you can learn programming and how to develop some Android applications. There's this saying that "we spend money, energy, and time to make money."You can earn as a content creator on YouTube or perhaps create a site and make some interesting content, but all that requires skill and patience before you can start monetizing your channel or site. Some people monetize their Facebook page, Twitter page, telegram channel, Instagram page and TikTokÂ  but it all requires skill and patience to do that.If you also stay on the forum and establish yourself and gain a higher rank, then you might stand a chance to earn even more than $20 in some signature campaigns.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.Who convinced you that you don't have a skill? I don't believe there is anyone who could be considered grown up that exist without a skill, because theire must definietly be something which the person will know how to do very well, and when they get their hands on those things their hand work will be complemented and appreciated. To me, all forms of farming are skills; providing that the person knows what they are doing on that field, they are skilled farmers; likewise, every other thing that could be done within one's reach is a skill, so saying you don't have a skill looks like condeming yourself in the eyes of others. Instead, you can possibly say that you don't have a skill that could fit in the digital world.Â Getting yourself a job that could pay you that amount might be a little hard for you considering the fact that you might not be digitally inclined to compete with your fellow job seekers, as most of them might require some level of knowledge and extra skill in some specified field. If you can read and understand English, you can fit in some online jobs like community moderator for upcoming projects, community manager, and all of that, as most new crypto projects out there are usually in search of people to help them control their social media community, and they are being paid weekly. The project will have to educate you about how the project operates so that you can be able to answer the questions that might come from new investors and community members. I can't get any links for that right now, but such a job fits in your description.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Try steemit.com/hive.blog â you can also shitpost, if people like your shitpost it would be a money without having any skill.

comments.author: Tuturtinular
comments.body: You can try filling out paid surveys. There are a few sites that pay to fill out their surveys, I tried that in the past but didn't get much of a result. maybe you can try it while learning to be a freelancerhttps://paidfromsurveys.com/best-survey-panels-that-pay-through-paypal

Looking at the posts for those with small IDs like me to inspire them.I am really happy sir .Sir you will be by our side to raise us.

comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on July 29, 2023, 12:44:44 PM$600 is the maximum you can earn here from just creating posts (but you need to develop your knowledge of Bitcoin)It's hard to earn through signature campaigns as he is just a Jr Member and it may take many months before he can rank up, and get selected in any campaigns. But again, nothing is impossible, but everything requires hard work and time.Quote from: JackieKing on July 30, 2023, 08:42:50 AMOf course sir, I am very happy to receive a merit given by you. You have inspired me a lot by giving me a merit sir. You have instilled in me a hope that I can, I will. Really sir I am very happy to get that merit. I have a request to you sir. Looking at the posts for those with small IDs like me to inspire them.I am really happy sir .Sir you will be by our side to raise us. You just become a Jr Member. This is just the beginning; you will get a lot more happy moments on the forum. Also, I will suggest you to check Fivver and see if you can offer any services. If you are a good writer maybe you can start your article writing service. It is you hwo have to develop a skill and then keep on trying on different freelancing platforms and you will get success one day if you are honest to yourself and a hard worker.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 30, 2023, 08:42:50 AMQuote from: hugeblack on July 29, 2023, 12:44:44 PMWhat are the things you like to do, if you have a computer with good specifications, you can start learning Photoshop and design, if you are inclined to language, you can translate articles and projects or learn a programming language and start developing applications, and if you are an artist, you can sell your paintings in NFT form.Tell us what you like to do and we can give you better options.$600 is the maximum you can earn here from just creating posts (but you need to develop your knowledge of Bitcoin)Overall, I gave you a merit, I hope it will motivate you to develop yourself.Of course sir, I am very happy to receive a merit given by you. You have inspired me a lot by giving me a merit sir. You have instilled in me a hope that I can, I will. Really sir I am very happy to get that merit. I have a request to you sir. Looking at the posts for those with small IDs like me to inspire them.You now have two merits it's a good start for you, you continue doing the bounty campaign, and since you are now a Junior member you have an additional campaign and that is the signature campaign, there are bounty campaigns that accept Junior members in their signature campaign but only in altcoin not in Bitcoin-based campaign like casinos campaign.Just study and learn good English based on your post it's not your native language, I'm sure within a year you will be better.

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on July 29, 2023, 07:00:05 AMI need a job[/glow][/b]I am Jackieking.Can anyone tell me the name of some best sites from where I can earn.Perday [ $5-20]I have no skill but I am interested to learn job.If you're interested in earning some money online without specific skills and are open to learning, there are a few websites and platforms where you can explore opportunities. However, please keep in mind that earning potential can vary, and it's essential to approach online opportunities with caution, as some may not be legitimate or may require more effort than anticipated. You need check like : - Online Surveys like yougov.com- Microtasks or Platforms like Amazon Mechanical Turk (MTurk) and Microworkers offer small online tasks that you can complete for a fee. These tasks can include data entry, categorization, and other simple jobs.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 30, 2023, 04:59:17 PM>>snip<<It's funny that we have an alt of a fake wallet seller giving advice on how to earn onlineÂ  Why can't you start by making yourself better first. Stop scamming people and selling to them fake wallet Mr/Mrs @humerh3

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Oh, man, I don'treally know what offer to you. $5-20 isn't big money, but when you want to earn it without having any skills, it's quite a lot. I've been away from this micro earnings stuff. there is things like surveys, mini tasks or faucets, but it doesn't pays much.Maybe it's easy to tell, more difficult to do, but I advice you to try learn something. Getting some specific skills will open more opportunities for you to earn good money.Quote from: JackieKing on July 30, 2023, 08:42:50 AMOf course sir, I am very happy to receive a merit given by you. You have inspired me a lot by giving me a merit sir. You have instilled in me a hope that I can, I will. Really sir I am very happy to get that merit. I have a request to you sir. Looking at the posts for those with small IDs like me to inspire them.I am really happy sir .Sir you will be by our side to raise us. C'mon, you used word ''sir'' 6 times in this post. Believe me, it doesn't looks good. Try to be more informal when you communicate.
